# MPSPurgeableState.nonVolatile

**Case**

The contents of the resource aren’t allowed to be discarded.

## Declaration

```swift
case nonVolatile
```

## Overview

Use this option to mark the resource as non-volatile so the system doesn’t discard it. This is equivalent to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLPurgeableState/nonVolatile].

## Constants

- **MPSPurgeableState.allocationDeferred**: The image’s underlying texture hasn’t been allocated yet. Attempts to set another purgeable state using the [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImage/setPurgeableState(_:)] method will be ignored.
- **MPSPurgeableState.keepCurrent**: The current state is queried but doesn’t change.
- **MPSPurgeableState.volatile**: The system is allowed to discard the resource to free up memory.
- **MPSPurgeableState.empty**: The contents of the resource are or will be discarded.
